archimate:Device.name: Tablet with Integrated Scan Engine (TISE)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Departments: Pharmacy, Stores, Facilities, Clinical Wards, Emergency, Procurement, Inventory Management • Purpose: Enable mobile documentation, asset scanning, inventory control, and barcode-based workflows in demanding work environments, including clinical, warehouse, and field service use.
1. Core Specifications
• Processor: o Octa-core ARM (2.0 GHz+) or Intel i5 (11th Gen or higher) depending on OS • Memory (RAM): o Minimum 8 GB • Storage: o 64 GB internal storage minimum (expandable via microSD to 256 GB or higher)
2. Display and Touchscreen
• Display Size: o 10 inches, optimized for portability and readability • Resolution: o Minimum 1920 x 1200 (Full HD) • Touch Input: o Capacitive multi-touch, supports use with gloves and stylus • Brightness: o 500+ nits for outdoor or brightly lit environments
3. Integrated Barcode Scanner
• Scan Engine Type: o 2D Imager (capable of reading all 1D and 2D symbologies: Code 128, QR Code, DataMatrix, PDF417, Aztec, etc.) • Scan Range: o Minimum 3 to 24 inches, optimized for close-range scanning • Performance: o Reads poorly printed, damaged, or low-contrast barcodes • Trigger Options: o Physical scan button, on-screen trigger, or programmable hardware key
4. Operating System Options
o Windows Version: Windows 11 Pro
5. Connectivity
• Wireless: o Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points) (802.11ax) o Bluetooth 5.1 or higher • Cellular (): o 4G LTE module for mobile connectivity • Ports: o 1x USB-C, 1x USB-A, 1x 3.5mm Audio, Pogo pin or magnetic charging interface • GPS: o Integrated GNSS (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo) for asset or field tracking
6. Ruggedization and Durability
• Drop Rating: o Survives 4–5 ft drops to concrete • Ingress Protection: o IP65 or higher (sealed against dust and water splashes) • Operating Temperature: o -10°C to 50°C • Housing: o Reinforced polycarbonate or magnesium alloy with rubber bumpers • Certifications: o MIL-STD-810H for shock, vibration, and temperature
7. Battery and Power
• Battery Life: o 8–10+ hours on typical usage • Battery Type: o Removable or hot-swappable lithium-ion battery • Charging Options: o USB-C, docking station, or pogo-pin connection o Battery health monitoring, fast charging support
8. Security Features
• Authentication: o Biometric (fingerprint or facial recognition) • Data Protection: o Full-disk encryption, secure boot, mobile device management (MDM) ready • Locking Mechanism: o Kensington lock slot
9. Accessories and Mounting
• Accessories: o Hand strap o Rugged carry case o Charging dock o Shoulder harness • Mounting: o Cart, wall, or vehicle dock mountable
